suite.name: Header

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

test.name: Header Element Is Present In The DOM

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the page source is checked
Check if header element exists in DOM
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the <header> element should exist in the page source
Check if header element exists in DOM
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.name: Header Is Visible On Page Load

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the page is checked for the header
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the main header should be visible
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

test.name: Logo Is Present In The Header

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the header content is checked
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the logo image should be present
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.name: Logo Has Appropriate Alt Text For Accessibility

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the logo element is examined
Validate logo alt attribute
Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.
kw.status: Could not get length of 'None'.
Could not get length of 'None'.
Could not get length of 'None'.

kw.name: Then the logo should have non-empty alt attribute

test.name: Logo Is Clickable And Links To Homepage

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should be navigated to the homepage
Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

test.name: All Expected Navigation Items Are Present

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the navigation section is checked
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the following navigation links should be present
Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

test.name: Mobile Menu Toggle Is Hidden On Desktop

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: When the header is checked for mobile menu
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the mobile menu toggle should not be visible
Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'css=.elementor-section--handles-inside .header-burger-icon:not(.opened)' exists but is not displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

Go To

test.name: Navigation Links Are Keyboard-focusable

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When I press Tab key repeatedly from page start
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then I should be able to focus each navigation link in order
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Contact Button Is Present In The Header

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the header is checked for contact button
Look for contact button in header
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

Check if contact button is present
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

test.name: Contact Button Is Styled As A Call-to-action

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the contact button is examined
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then the "Contact" button should have a distinct visual style (e.g., background color)
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Contact Button Is Clickable

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should be taken to the contact page or modal
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Contact Button Has Appropriate ARIA Label Or Role

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When the contact button attributes are checked
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then the "Contact" button should have a valid role or aria-label
Run Keyword And Return Status
Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.arg: Contact button should have a valid role or aria-label

test.name: Mobile Menu Toggle Is Visible On Mobile Viewport

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: When the header is checked for mobile menu
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Then the mobile menu toggle should be visible
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

test.name: Mobile Menu Is Hidden By Default On Mobile

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait for page to load completely
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Then the mobile navigation menu should be hidden
Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'css=.header-menu__wrapper' exists but is not displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

test.name: Clicking Mobile Toggle Opens The Menu

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: When I click the mobile menu toggle
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then the mobile navigation menu should be visible
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Given the viewport is set to desktop-sized
Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: When I hover over the "Portfolio" link
Log

kw.name: Then it should display a hover effect (e.g., color change, underline)
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When I tab to the "Contact" button
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then it should display a clear focus ring or outline
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Header Remains Fixed Or Behaves As Designed On Scroll

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 200) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Then the header should maintain its expected scroll behavior (fixed/sticky/collapsible)
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Header Renders Correctly Even If One Asset Fails To Load

kw.name: Given the logo image fails to load
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Then the header layout should not break
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When I use only Tab and Enter keys
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Then I should be able to access all interactive header elements
Log

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Header Adapts To System Dark Mode

kw.name: Given the OS is set to dark mode
No Operation
kw.doc: Does absolutely nothing.

kw.name: Wait for page to load completely
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Then the header should use appropriate dark-mode colors
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Given I am on the homepage
Go To

kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
